text: tus hernia - High palate - Hypertelorism - Hyporeflexia - Increased arm span - Inguinal hernia - Joint hypermobility - Kyphoscoliosis - Mitral regurgitation - Pectus carinatum - Pectus excavatum - Pes planus - Proptosis - Retrognathia - Short stature - Small for gestational age - Tall stature - The Human Phenotype Ontology (HPO) has collected information on how often a sign or symptom occurs in a condition.
